import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/hehehe/Desktop/scripts/glass_ai/frontend/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8000';// Generic fetch function with error handling
const apiFetch=async function(endpoint){let options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};try{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},options),{},{headers:_objectSpread({'Content-Type':'application/json'},options.headers)}));if(!response.ok){throw new Error("API request failed with status ".concat(response.status));}return await response.json();}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching from ".concat(endpoint,":"),error);throw error;}};// Knowledge Graph API functions
export const knowledgeGraphApi={// Get causes of a defect
getCausesOfDefect:async function(defect){let minConfidence=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0.5;const data=await apiFetch("/knowledge-graph/causes/".concat(defect,"?min_confidence=").concat(minConfidence));return data.causes||[];},// Get intervention recommendations
getRecommendations:async(defect,parameterValues)=>{const data=await apiFetch("/knowledge-graph/recommendations/".concat(defect),{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({parameter_values:parameterValues})});return data.recommendations||[];},// Get subgraph for visualization

getHealthStatus:async()=>{return await apiFetch('/health');},// Get model predictions
